item.description:
Hi group,

I got the word from Pat Droney that this Friday will not work for the church - scheduling conflict. We can begin the following Friday.

I have asked Ginny and Jim to prepare an outline of an agenda. At the meeting we will choose/elect people to assume specific responsibilities. We will have the room for approx. 1 hour so please bring along your long-term goals, solutions and strategies and possible snares to your goals.

If anyone would like to bring food/drinks that would be a nice touch - if not we will make arrangements to do so for the subsequent meetings. We are required to keep the space clean and orderly - that goes without saying.

Unless you get an email to the contrary the meeting time will be: Friday, October 2nd @ 6:30 PM
The meeting place is: Lutheran Church Of Our Redeemer, 20 North Street, Enfield, CT (860) 749-3167).

In patriotism,

Carole
item.name: NCC Monthly Meetup
